attributes.action: reject the recommendation that the national speed limit be reduced to 50 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is another measure which removes responsibility from the driver of the vehicle and encourages a further reduction in driver skill. We already have some of the safest roads in the world and further casualty reductions would be better approached through driver training to recognise road conditions and drive accordingly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
